generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A paved sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and adjacent to a building.
- building: A white building with a glass front and graffiti on its side is visible on the right side of the image.
- fence: A green metal fence runs along the right side of the road, behind the sidewalk.
- pole: A tall, thin pole, likely for a streetlight or traffic sign, is visible on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign is visible on the left side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and bushes are visible along both sides of the road.
- terrain: Patches of grass and dirt are visible along the edges of the road and sidewalk.
- sky: A small portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy at the top of the image.
- car: A dark-colored car is visible in the center of the image, driving away from the camera.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the left side of the road, near the sidewalk.
